---
  description: Creates smoothed conditional means and then convert them with ggplotly
  function: geom_smooth
  permalink: /ggplot2/layers/geoms/geom_smooth/
  layout: base
  language: ggplot2
  name: geom_smooth
  reference: https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/reference/
---

# Default smooth plot

<pre class="mcode">
p <-   
 ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
  
plotly::ggplotly(p)
</pre>

# Adjusting smoothness

The `span` is the fraction of points used to fit each local regression: small numbers make a wigglier curve, larger numbers make a smoother curve.

<pre class="mcode">
p <-   
 ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(span = 0.3)
  
plotly::ggplotly(p)
</pre>

  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, se = FALSE)

<pre class="mcode">
p <-   
 ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) +
  geom_point() +

# Fitting groups

Smooths are automatically fit to each group (defined by categorical aesthetics or the group aesthetic) and for each facet.


<pre class="mcode">
p <-   
 ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE, method = lm)
  
plotly::ggplotly(p)
</pre>

# Adding facets

<pre class="mcode">
p <-   
 ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(span = 0.8) +
  facet_wrap(~drv)
  
plotly::ggplotly(p)
</pre>

# Binomial fit

<pre class="mcode">
binomial_smooth <- function(...) {
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", method.args = list(family = "binomial"), ...)
}
p <-   
 ggplot(rpart::kyphosis, aes(Age, Kyphosis)) +
  geom_jitter(height = 0.05) +
  binomial_smooth()
  
plotly::ggplotly(p)
</pre>

<pre class="mcode">
binomial_smooth <- function(...) {
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", method.args = list(family = "binomial"), ...)
}
p <-   
 ggplot(rpart::kyphosis, aes(Age, as.numeric(Kyphosis) - 1)) +
  geom_jitter(height = 0.05) +
  binomial_smooth()
  
plotly::ggplotly(p)
</pre>

<pre class="mcode">
binomial_smooth <- function(...) {
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", method.args = list(family = "binomial"), ...)
}
p <-   
 ggplot(rpart::kyphosis, aes(Age, as.numeric(Kyphosis) - 1)) +
  geom_jitter(height = 0.05) +
  binomial_smooth(formula = y ~ splines::ns(x, 2))
  
plotly::ggplotly(p)
</pre>
